mapper.insert: insert into translationTask(taskId, sellerId, translatorId, taskType, createdAt, status) values(#{taskId}, #{sellerId}, #{translatorId}, #{taskType}, #{createdAt}, #{status})
mapper.select: select * from translationTask where translatorId = #{translatorId} and status = 0 and taskType = #{taskType} limit #{page.numBegin}, #{page.pageSize}
mapper.update: update translationTask set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
